description: Only for Wear. Monitor battery and CPU temperatures of your wearable device.    The values are auto-refreshed each 10 seconds. Click it to refresh it manually.Long press to exit.    Celsius or Fahrenheit can be selected (swipe to the left to see the setting).Round and square screens are supported.    Note: Not all devices support processor temperature.
descriptionHTML:
Only for Wear. Monitor battery and CPU temperatures of your wearable device.

The values are auto-refreshed each 10 seconds. Click it to refresh it manually.
Long press to exit.

Celsius or Fahrenheit can be selected (swipe to the left to see the setting).
Round and square screens are supported.

Note: Not all devices support processor temperature.
comments: Useful A handy app, it would be good if it could detect room temperature by taking the battery temperature and some manual user calibration for correction, say -10Â°, from what the battery temperature is.

Great simple app for checking battery and CPU temperature Gave some feedback to developer regarding LG G Watch R compatibility and in return got quick fix for my watch and some sneak peek in future of the app. Great developer! Loking forward for future features! :)
Works perfectly. And the price is right ðŸ˜‰
Battery drain Im giving 5 stars because it works perfectly. However, after installing, i experience a rapid battery drain on my gwr. From 100% to 80% in 4 hours.
recentChanges: Presenting Fahrenheit by default for US

Fixed notification touch to force refresh
Full support (CPU and Battery) added to LG G Watch R

Full support (CPU and Battery) added to Gear Live
